verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> The words יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּעֲנָת֔וֹת <S%H6068><s%> that [were] in Anathoth בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> To whom the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> in בִּימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> came in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֖וֹן <S%H526><s%> of Amon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בִּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> It came also in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֤ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֹּם֙ <S%H8552><s%> unto the end עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְצִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H6667><s%> of Zedekiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until גְּל֥וֹת <S%H1540><s%> captive יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> in the fifth ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before [אֶצֹּורְךָ כ] (אֶצָּרְךָ֤ <S%H3335><s%> earthen ק) בַבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <S%H990><s%> thee in the belly יְדַעְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H3045><s%> I knew וּבְטֶ֛רֶם <S%H2962><s%> and before תֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> thee and before thou camest forth מֵרֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> out of the womb הִקְדַּשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <S%H6942><s%> I sanctified נָבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> thee a prophet לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> unto the nations נְתַתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5414><s%> thee [and] I ordained

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> behold I cannot דַּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> speak כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נַ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> for I [am] a child אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto me Say נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> not I [am] a child אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I אֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֙ <S%H7971><s%> to all that I shall send תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i אֲצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> thee and whatsoever I command תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> thee thou shalt speak

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> of their faces כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I am לְהַצִּלֶ֖ךָ <S%H5337><s%> for I [am] with thee to deliver נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> put forth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיַּגַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> and touched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֑י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> unto me Behold I have put דְבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> my words בְּפִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> in thy mouth

רְאֵ֞ה <S%H7200><s%> See הִפְקַדְתִּ֣יךָ ׀ <S%H6485><s%> set הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> I have this day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> thee over the nations וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and over the kingdoms לִנְת֥וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> to root out וְלִנְת֖וֹץ <S%H5422><s%> and to pull down וּלְהַאֲבִ֣יד <S%H6><s%> and to destroy וְלַהֲר֑וֹס <S%H2040><s%> and to throw down לִבְנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build וְלִנְטֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H5193><s%> and to plant פ

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> what seest יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> thou? And I said מַקֵּ֥ל <S%H4731><s%> a rod שָׁקֵ֖ד <S%H8247><s%> of an almond tree אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> I see

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about הֵיטַ֣בְתָּ <S%H3190><s%> unto me Thou hast well לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> seen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁקֵ֥ד <S%H8245><s%> for I will hasten אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דְּבָרִ֖י <S%H1697><s%> my word לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6213><s%> to perform פ

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me שֵׁנִ֣ית <S%H8145><s%> came unto me the second time לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> I רֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> thou? And I said סִ֤יר <S%H5518><s%> pot נָפ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H5301><s%> a seething אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I רֹאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> I see וּפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> and the face מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> thereof [is] toward צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> the north

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me מִצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> unto me Out of the north תִּפָּתַ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> shall break forth הָרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> an evil עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold קֹרֵ֗א <S%H7121><s%> For lo I will call לְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <S%H4940><s%> all the families מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdoms צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> of the north נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּבָ֡אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they shall come וְֽנָתְנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> and they shall set אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one כִּסְא֜וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne פֶּ֣תַח ׀ <S%H6607><s%> at the entering שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> of the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חוֹמֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2346><s%> and against all the walls סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and against all the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְדִבַּרְתִּ֤י <S%H1696><s%> And I will utter מִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <S%H4941><s%> my judgments אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> against them touching כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָעָתָ֑ם <S%H7451><s%> all their wickedness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whereby עֲזָב֗וּנִי <S%H5800><s%> who have forsaken וַֽיְקַטְּרוּ֙ <S%H6999><s%> me and have burned incense לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> unto other וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לְמַעֲשֵׂ֥י <S%H4639><s%> the works יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> of their own hands

וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you תֶּאְזֹ֣ר <S%H247><s%> Thou therefore gird up מָתְנֶ֔יךָ <S%H4975><s%> thy loins וְקַמְתָּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> and arise וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אֲצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H6680><s%> unto them all that I command אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחַת֙ <S%H2865><s%> thee be not dismayed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> at their faces פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> or אֲחִתְּךָ֖ <S%H2865><s%> lest I confound לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> thee before

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> For behold I הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold נְתַתִּ֣יךָ <S%H5414><s%> have made הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לְעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> city מִבְצָ֜ר <S%H4013><s%> a defenced וּלְעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar בַּרְזֶ֛ל <S%H1270><s%> and an iron וּלְחֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2346><s%> walls נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brasen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> against the whole land לְמַלְכֵ֤י <S%H4428><s%> against the kings יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְשָׂרֶ֔יהָ <S%H8269><s%> against the princes לְכֹהֲנֶ֖יהָ <S%H3548><s%> thereof against the priests וּלְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> thereof and against the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> And they shall fight אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> against וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> they will not י֣וּכְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> against thee but they shall not prevail לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> you נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> against thee for I [am] with thee saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְהַצִּילֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5337><s%> to deliver פ
